thread.title: WATCH: Today's Goal Of The Day Goes To Aiden McGeady
thread.title_full: WATCH: Today's Goal Of The Day Goes To Aiden McGeady

title: WATCH: Today's Goal Of The Day Goes To Aiden McGeady
text:
WATCH: Today's Goal Of The Day Goes To Aiden McGeady Sat Feb 25 2017 22:08:40 GMT+0000 (GMT) Sat Feb 25 2017 22:08:40 GMT+0000 (GMT) TheSPORTbible football 
Aiden McGeady rolled back the years to score a beauty for Preston against QPR this afternoon. 
The Irish winger is now turning out for the English Championship side on loan after finding himself out of favour at Everton at the start of the season. 
That's probably the level his performances have earned him the right to play at over recent years. 
McGeady, 30, last played for Everton in August 2015 and even found himself struggling to get a game during a loan spell with promotion-chasing Sheffield Wednesday last season. 
But the man who created such a buzz early on in his Celtic career at least looks to be improving with North End. 
He was instrumental as they earned a hard-fought 2-1 win over QPR today, netting the sort of goal that Celtic fans may remember from his time at Celtic Park:
